definition: value/(to be) worth/to happen to/to be on duty
straight/to straighten/fair and reasonable/frank/straightforward/(indicates continuing motion or action)/vertical/vertical downward stroke in Chinese characters
surname Zhi/Zhi (c. 2000 BC), fifth of the legendary Flame Emperors 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
just at the time of/honest/upright/(math.) positive value

pinyin: guo2 nei4 sheng1 chan3 zong3 zhi2

sentences.english: Atoms must start with a lower case character, or you can delimit with single quotes.
sentences.chinese: 原子值必須以小寫字母開頭，否則需要加上單引號。

sentences.english: The value passed to the actions should be comma-delimited lists of values.
sentences.chinese: 傳遞給動作的值應該是以逗號分隔的值列表。

sentences.chinese: 傳遞給動作的值應該是以逗號分隔的值列表。

sentences.english: Is the radian frequency deviation from the center frequency.
sentences.chinese: 是角頻率與中心頻率的偏離值。

sentences.english: This is a quarter, worth twenty five cents.
Can be based on specifications set the value to calculate the bending stress values.
sentences.chinese: 能，可依據規格設定值來計算出折曲壓力值。

sentences.english: My sincere congratulations on this auspicious event of yours.
sentences.chinese: 值你倆大喜之日，謹致最誠摯的祝賀。

sentences.english: Enlarging the sectional area of surge tank obviously changes minimum pressure in draft tube.
sentences.chinese: 增大調壓室面積會明顯改變尾水管最小壓力值。

sentences.english: And say let's just print them both.
sentences.chinese: 那麼就讓我們把這兩個值都顯示出來。
他估計這枚戒指值80美元。

sentences.english: If you double the system, they double in there numerical number.
sentences.chinese: 如果你把系統擴大一倍，它們的值也會擴大一倍。

sentences.english: Similarly, avoid values that could result in errors due to the reference-input current.
sentences.chinese: 同樣，由於輸入參考電流避免導致誤差的值。

sentences.english: This paper proposes a recursive forecast method for elevator traffic flow based on outlier detection.
sentences.chinese: 提出一種基於異常值檢測的電梯交通流遞歸預測方法。

sentences.english: Some of the pixel formats contain premultiplied color values.
sentences.chinese: 某些像素格式包含自左乘的顏色值。

sentences.english: ADC values and FA values may be predictive of astrocytic tumor classification.
sentences.chinese: FA值在腫瘤良惡性鑑別中有一定的價值。
